verses.html:
1
Oh, how sweet the glorious message
Simple faith may claim;
Yesterday, today, forever,
Jesus is the same!

verses.label: 1C
verses.html:
1
Still He loves to save the sinful,
Heal the sick and lame,
Cheer the mourner, calm the tempest
Glory to His name!

verses.label: 1C
verses.html:
1
Yesterday, today, forever,
Jesus is the same;
All may change, but Jesus never,
Glory to His name!

verses.label: 1C
verses.html:
1
Glory to His name,
Glory to His name;
All may change, but Jesus never,
Glory to His name!

2
He who was the friend of sinners
Seeks the lost one now;
Sinner, come, and at His footstool
Penitently bow;

verses.label: 2C
verses.html:
2
He who said “I’ll not condemn thee,
Go, and sin no more,”
Speaks to Thee that word of pardon,
As in days of yore.

verses.label: 2C
verses.html:
2
Yesterday, today, forever,
Jesus is the same;
All may change, but Jesus never,
Glory to His name!

verses.label: 2C
verses.html:
2
Glory to His name,
Glory to His name;
All may change, but Jesus never,
Glory to His name!

3
He who pardoned erring Peter,
Never need’st thou fear;
He who came to faithless Thomas
All thy doubt will clear;

verses.label: 3C
verses.html:
3
He who let the loved disciple
On His bosom rest
Bids thee still, with love as tender,
Lean upon His breast.

verses.label: 3C
verses.html:
3
Yesterday, today, forever,
Jesus is the same;
All may change, but Jesus never,
Glory to His name!

verses.label: 3C
verses.html:
3
Glory to His name,
Glory to His name;
All may change, but Jesus never,
Glory to His name!

4
He who, ’mid the raging billows,
Walked upon the sea
Still can hush our wildest tempest,
As on Galilee;

verses.label: 4C
verses.html:
4
He who wept and prayed in anguish
In Gethsemane
Drinks with us each cup of trembling,
In our agony.

verses.label: 4C
verses.html:
4
Yesterday, today, forever,
Jesus is the same;
All may change, but Jesus never,
Glory to His name!

verses.label: 4C
verses.html:
4
Glory to His name,
Glory to His name;
All may change, but Jesus never,
Glory to His name!

5
As of old He walked to Emmaus
With them to abide,
So, through all life’s way He walketh,
Ever near our side;

verses.label: 5C
verses.html:
5
Soon again shall we behold Him
Hasten, Lord, the day!
But ’twill still be “this same Jesus,”
As He went away.

verses.label: 5C
verses.html:
5
Yesterday, today, forever,
Jesus is the same;
All may change, but Jesus never,
Glory to His name!

verses.label: 5C
verses.html:
5
Glory to His name,
Glory to His name;
All may change, but Jesus never,
Glory to His name!
